title.en: Kami no Mezame no Gjallarhorn: Hazure Skill “Mezamashi” wa, Fuuin Kaijo no Nouryoku deshita

altTitles.ja: 神の目覚めのギャラルホルン~外れスキル《目覚まし》は、封印解除の能力でした~

description.en:
Unwanted Skill: Awakening a New Saga!

A fantasy tale of an unfortunate boy's journey.

In a world where gods bestow special powers known as "Skills" upon individuals, young Leon, an aspiring adventurer, is saddled with an ability deemed worthless: "Alarm Clock." Despite its lowly status, Leon diligently works as an alarm clock for the townspeople, supporting his ailing sister. However, his life is marred by constant debt to the cruel nobleman Gideon.

One fateful day, Leon's seemingly useless "Alarm Clock" evolves, unlocking the ability to "Unseal." A golden coin he possesses transforms into the goddess of the sun, Solana, and Leon is thrust into an epic adventure to unravel the mysteries of the gods' seals.

With his newfound power, Leon embarks on a quest to become the "Gentle Strongest," defying the odds and rewriting his destiny. This captivating fantasy saga unfolds, detailing the trials and triumphs of an unlikely hero.
description.ja:
外れスキルが、新たな神話(サガ)を呼び覚ます!
不遇の少年が歩み始める、神話ファンタジー!
神様から与えられる特別な力〈スキル〉。冒険者を志す少年・リオンは、"外れスキル"と貶される『目覚まし』という能力しか持っていなかった。病弱な妹のために、朝早くから街の人々を起こす仕事をしているのだが、いじわるな貴族・ギデオンに借金を返すだけの日々……。そのとき、外れスキルのはずの『目覚まし』が進化し、『封印解除』が発動した! 彼の持っていた金貨から太陽の女神・ソラーナが現れ、リオンは神々の封印を巡る冒険へと旅立つ。不遇な少年が"優しい最強"を目指す、神話ファンタジー開幕!
